name: TELEGRAM MANAGEMENT x MUSIC BOTt
description: A Powerful  Telegram group management and music bot with addtional features

BOT_USERNAME.description: fill with your bot username from @BotFather but without using '@' symbol

SESSION_NAME.description: fill with the pyrogram String Session ðŸ‘‰ https://t.me/SessionStringGeneratorZBot

MONGODB_URL.description: fill with the mongodb url, You must create it first from cloud.mongodb.com !

SUDO_USERS.description: fill with the user id you want to be added into sudo member list (separate with spaces), or You can just fill this with your id

OWNER_ID.description: fill with your own telegram id, this is needed because there's any feature that only can be used by bot owner

GROUP_SUPPORT.description: if you have group, then fill the group username here without @

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: if you have channel, then fill the channel username here without @

OWNER_USERNAME.description: fill with your telegram account username without @

ALIVE_NAME.description: fill with your telegram account nickname/name
